trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer"></xref> class that a type or property should use when it is serialized.
For a type, you apply the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> attribute at the type level.
For a property, you apply the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> attribute at the property level.
Application at the property level potentially overrides any previous declaration for that property's type as applied at the type level.

A <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer> can be associated with an attachable member by applying the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> attribute on the static `get` accessor method for the attachable member.
Value serialization is also applicable for enumerations, interfaces and structures, but not for delegates.
In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute"></xref> class, using an assembly qualified type name string.
The assembly qualified type name string is the value of <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> for the requested <xref:System.Type>.
The assembly qualified type name string for the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer"></xref> class to use.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializerAttribute"></xref> class, using the specified type.
A type that represents the type of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer"></xref> class.
Gets the type of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer"></xref> class reported by this attribute.
Gets the assembly qualified name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer"></xref> type for this type or property.
The assembly qualified name of the type.
